main.name: Tim Potts
main.description: I enjoy and excel at functional programming with emphasis on the back-end of production.
main.bio: I am a graduate of the University of Colorado at Boulder with a BA in Mathematics. I then completed a 6-month bootcamp at the University of Denver focusing on Full-Stack development. I am trying to break into the programming world by any means necessary
main.contactmessage: Please feel free to contact me with questions.

resume.skillmessage: With a formal education in computational Mathematics, supplemented by a Web Development bootcamp, I have the skills to be a valuable asset at your company.

education.description: Six month immersive course for Full Stack web development.
